title: Horizon Walker Tier List
description: Discover the top characters in Horizon Walker with our comprehensive tier list, ranking from S to C Tier to help you build the ultimate team.
heading: Horizon Walker Tier List
introText: Discover the top characters in Horizon Walker with our comprehensive tier list, ranking from S to C Tier to help you build the ultimate team.

data.itemDescription: Core character in endgame teams, known for self-sustaining stealth and resilience
Exceptional AoE damage dealer, highly effective in various scenarios

High mobility and single-target damage; however, notably fragile
